transforma.qb2_user_app.pointcloud

类 Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • transforma.qb2_user_app.pointcloud.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    A general class that store static method for OpenGl functionality

      • LoadTexture

        public static int LoadTexture(android.opengl.GLSurfaceView view,
                              int imgResID)
        This methos is a generic method for loading textures to a Glsurfaceview
        参数:
        view -
        imgResID -
        返回:

      • LoadShader

        public static int LoadShader(java.lang.String strSource,
                             int iType)
        This method is a general method for loading shader to vertex or fragment
        参数:
        strSource - the RawSourceString for the vertex or the fragment
        iType - vertex shader or fragment shader
        返回:
        success or failure indicator, 0 for fail

      • LoadProgram

        public static int LoadProgram(java.lang.String strVSource,
                              java.lang.String strFSource)
        This is a general method for loading glgrograme for the entire drawing
        参数:
        strVSource - Raw String for vertex
        strFSource - Raw String for fragment
        返回:
        success or failure indicator, 0 for fail

      • rnd

        public static float rnd(float min,
                        float max)

      • readTextFileFromRawResource

        public static java.lang.String readTextFileFromRawResource(android.content.Context context,
                                                           int resourceId)
        Read raw string stored in res/raw folder so that we dont need to write raw string in Java files
        参数:
        context - GLSurfaceView
        resourceId - raw string ID
        返回:
        raw string
